publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3109 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees— (a) as a revision to the Business Programme agreed on 9 May 2002— Wednesday 15 May 2002 after Decision Time, delete followed by Members' Business - debate on the subject of S1M-3076 Michael Russell: Scottish Criminal Record Office and, replace with followed by Members' Business - debate on the subject of S1M-2988 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Autism Awareness Week, 12 – 19 May 2002 Supported by: Euan Robson*
